name: Fennel Bird
description:
Fennel Bird is a Flappybird clone coded in the Fennel language on the Tic-80 fantasy console.

This is my entry for Fennel Game Jam 1

Controls

Menu

  • UP
  • DOWN
  • Z(A)
  • X(B)

Game - all gamepad input will make the bird flap

  • UP
  • DOWN
  • LEFT
  • RIGHT
  • Z(A)
  • X(B)

See how high you can score!

Tic80.com link - http://tic80.com/play?cart=2814

Bird art from https://ma9ici4n.itch.io/pixel-art-bird-16x16
